folder: Bay Ridge Avenue & Ridge Boulevard, Brooklyn, NY
original_title: Brooklyn: Bay Ridge Avenue - Ridge Boulevard
text:
(1)
157-141 Bay Ridge Ave., north side, between Ridge Blvd., and Colonial
Road, showing a view of two old frame houses.
April 29, 1929.
L. SPerr.
(e)
The same, showing only No. 157.
December 17, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
